feature: Split large executor.service.ts into focused modules
description: Refactor the monolithic executor.service.ts (483 lines) into 5 focused single-responsibility services: types, context building, risk checking, LLM decisions, and trade execution. Following existing patterns in prediction-market/ and trends/ directories.

phases.name: Create Shared Types
phases.description: Extract interfaces and types into a shared types file

subtasks.title: Create executor types file
subtasks.description: Create apps/server/src/services/agent/executor/types.ts with TradeDecision, ExecutorContext, RiskCheckResult interfaces and AGENT_DECISION_PROMPT constant
subtasks.notes: types.ts file already exists with all required interfaces (TradeDecision, ExecutorContext, RiskCheckResult) and AGENT_DECISION_PROMPT constant. All types properly exported and match the original executor.service.ts implementation.

phases.name: Extract Context Builder
phases.description: Create dedicated service for building execution context

subtasks.title: Create context service
subtasks.description: Create apps/server/src/services/agent/executor/context.service.ts with buildContext logic - fetches open positions, recent trades, market data, and news context

phases.name: Extract Risk Checker
phases.description: Create dedicated service for risk limit validation

subtasks.title: Create risk service
subtasks.description: Create apps/server/src/services/agent/executor/risk.service.ts with checkRiskLimits logic - validates max positions, time between trades, daily loss limits

phases.name: Extract Decision Maker
phases.description: Create dedicated service for LLM trade decisions

subtasks.title: Create decision service
subtasks.description: Create apps/server/src/services/agent/executor/decision.service.ts with getTradeDecision logic - formats prompts, calls OpenAI, parses responses

phases.name: Extract Trade Executor
phases.description: Create dedicated service for executing trades

subtasks.title: Create trade service
subtasks.description: Create apps/server/src/services/agent/executor/trade.service.ts with executeTrade logic - opens positions, closes positions, updates performance

phases.name: Refactor Orchestrator
phases.description: Refactor executor.service.ts to be a thin orchestrator using extracted services

subtasks.title: Refactor executor.service.ts
subtasks.description: Update apps/server/src/services/agent/executor.service.ts to use the extracted services - keep only startAgent, stopAgent, executeAgent, getRunningAgents, stopAll as thin orchestration layer

subtasks.title: Update agent index exports
subtasks.description: Update apps/server/src/services/agent/index.ts to export new services if needed

subtasks.title: Run TypeScript check
subtasks.description: Run bun check-types to verify no type errors

subtasks.title: Run linting
subtasks.description: Run bun check to verify code style

final_acceptance: All TypeScript compilation passes without errors
executor.service.ts is reduced to ~100 lines (orchestration only)
Each extracted service has a single responsibility
